title: Cross Industry Virtual Hackathon Malaysia (CIVH) 2020
description: Participated in CIVH 2020 and built RekSpace, a network of office-turned-youth-centers made possible by IoT. Awarded first prize in the HLX problem statement category
body:
> * The problem statement, sponsored by HLX was "How might we increase the space utilisation of an office building in the city with low tenancy, given changing work practices?"
> * Our solution was RekSpace,  a network of office-turned-youth-centers for youths to be enabled and do great things, powered by AI and IoT
> * Was awarded first prize for the problem statement and won RM 5,000
> * Team consists of [Mujahid](https://twitter.com/mujahid_fa), [Fahim](https://twitter.com/FahimAqil), and [Izqalan](https://izqalan.github.io/)
> * Check out the pitch here: https://youtu.be/36NdSB0nCm4
